radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver shows no evidence of focal lesions or textural abnormality. There is no evidence of intrahepatic biliary dilatation. The common bile duct measures 8 mm in the porta hepatis but tapers somewhat distally to 6 mm. There is cholelithiasis with a distended gallbladder with mild wall edema. Patient was tender over entire upper abdomen. The pancreas was not well visualized due to overlying bowel gas.
